snippet: Rick Santorum likes to lower expectations, which helped him in Iowa.
abstract: Rick Santorum likes to lower expectations, which helped him in Iowa.
lead_paragraph: SALEM, N.H. -- Rick Santorum said Monday that he could only imagine finishing second in the New Hampshire primary, given that the polls here have him in third or fourth place, bunched up with other Republican presidential candidates.

headline.main: For Santorum, Second Would Be a Dream
